replies.body: when riot reworks a champion because they are annoying as fuck and too good all game with very low risk as an ap mid, into a wierd as bruiser ap thing that jungles and is now also very annoying all game long with very low risk, 11/10 balance team defs should remain employed.
Of course he's fine he has a rainbow suit.
f*ck gragas hes not even good, Cho'Gath is the real problem here, op burst op sustained damage op true damage nuke.

Yeah but I don't have to deal with Cho 24/7 he only becomes problematic after lane and if he makes a few mistakes or I have somehow come close to equalizing him itemwise he can be dealt with, Gragas is just a consistent bully all over the map and then continues to be annoying after lane phase.
Don't villainise gays, it's not right.

Lol sorry just lack slightly less offensive than usual curse words.
